name: SmarteraHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on room”
”Alexa, turn off room”
”Alexa, set dimmer to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use Alexa to control all of our switches.
Follow these steps
-Configure the switch to Smartera Home.
-Register your own account and backup the switch information,before that, you can change the name of the switch and create your favorite scene
-To get started,"Enable SKill" in Alexa,link your Smartera Home account and discover your deveices.

Supported Devices: all Smart Switch
Supported Actions:turn on,turn off,setPercent
